沵字的基本解释

沵
mǐ
水满：“河水沵沵”。

沵
lì
古同“沴”。

沵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
亦作“沵1”。
(1)水流不畅。
(2)引申为阻水的高地。
(3)旧谓天地四时之气不和而生的灾害。
(4)引申为相害，相伤。

沵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沵； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页613第11
【字彙】同沴。　又水名，在襄陽。【水經注】零水東逕新城縣之沵鄕縣，謂之沵水。又東歷宜城西山，謂之沵谿。東流合於夷水，謂之沵口。

沵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
沵字的起名意思

本义是形容水满，也可比喻平坦，盛大的样子。

沵
Basic explanation of words
沵
mǐ
Full of water: "Heshui 沵沵".
沵
lì
The ancient same as "Xiao".
沵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guang Yun" Lang Ji cut, go to Ji, come. ]
Also known as "沵1".
(1) The water flow is not smooth.
(2) By extension, it is a highland that blocks water.
(3) It was said that the disaster caused by the disharmony of the four seasons of heaven and earth.
(4) It is extended to harm each other and hurt each other.
沵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沵; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 613-11
【Vocabulary】The same as that.　Also named as water, in Xiangyang. 【Notes on Water Classics】Zhuoyang County in Dongjing Xincheng County of Lingshui is called Huoshui. It is also called Xishan in the east of Yicheng, which is called Xiongxi. Dongliu merges with Yishui, which is called Xuankou.

沵
Name meaning
The original meaning is to describe the water is full, but it can also be compared to the flat and grand appearance.
